resources.string:
Below is a skeleton code version for this challenge.


The important thing to remember is that since ScrollView can only have one child, you have 

to wrap that ImageView and the TextView into a LinearLayout.


There is no solution code provided for this challenge, 
 

but the skeleton code below gives you the expected view hierarchy to use.
